original: Conquered as Leader of an Uprising
Personal Opinion difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! lower than §Y$VAL$§!
translation: 对§Y$FIRST$§!和§Y$SECOND$§!的个人好感差异低于 §Y$VAL$§!

original: Personal Opinion difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! at least §Y$VAL$§!
translation: 对§Y$FIRST$§!和§Y$SECOND$§!的个人好感差异至少 §Y$VAL$§!

original: I have grown more trusting, accepting whatever fate has in store for me. I have lost the Paranoid trait.
translation: 我变得更加容易信任别人，无论等待着我的命运如何，我都从容接受。我已不再多疑。

original: I have become aware of people's duplicity. I have lost the Trusting trait.
translation: 我对旁人奸诈的行为更加警惕。我失去了轻信他人特质。

original: I have suffered enough pain and betrayal. Why help those who hurt me back? I have lost the Kind trait.
translation: 我已经经受了太多的痛苦和背叛。为什么我要去帮助那些回过头就会伤害我的人？我失去了仁慈特质。

original: The wounds have marked me for life. I have gained the Scarred trait.
translation: 这些伤痕将烙印在我身上、伴随我终生。我获得了伤疤特质。

original: Divorce §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! for [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] proven unfaithfulness! [Recipient.GetPossPronounCap] close relatives will still be insulted (§R$OPINION$§! opinion)...
translation: 与§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!离婚因为[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]被证明不忠！[Recipient.GetPossPronounCap]近亲仍将被侮辱（§R$OPINION$§! 好感）……

original: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! is declared a legitimate [From.GetSonDaughter] with full inheritance rights.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!被宣告为拥有完全继承权的合法[From.GetSonDaughter]。\n

original: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! remains illegitimate, but is sanctioned as my [From.GetSonDaughter] and can be married off to form alliances. If [From.GetSubjectPronoun] ever has children, a new dynasty will be created for that line.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!仍然是不合法的私生子，但被承认为我的[From.GetSonDaughter]并能与别的贵族联姻结盟。一旦[From.GetSubjectPronoun]有了自己的孩子，一个新的家族将会从这一支系中开创出来。\n

original: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! is denounced as a bastard with an unknown father, having no official connection to me at all.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!被指控是一个不知其父的野种，与我毫无半点正式关系。\n

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is pregnant and I can't possibly be the father! The realm is already astir with gossip - everyone knows [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] is the real father.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]怀孕了，然而我不可能是孩子的父亲！全国都在传这个八卦——所有人都知道[From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName]才是孩子真正的父亲。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] tells me she is pregnant, but that can't be right, can it?
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]告诉我她怀孕了，但那是不可能的，难道不是吗？

original: I have thought it over, and I cannot be the father of my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s baby. As it grows in her belly, I have trouble sleeping. I must put this matter to rest!
translation: 我已经仔细考虑过这件事了，我不可能是我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]肚子里的孩子的父亲。一想到它在她的肚子里一天一天地长大，我就无法安然入睡。我必须要把这件事平息掉！
雇佣某人去查清这一切

original: The maid I paid to spy on my [GetFromRelation] has confirmed my suspicions - [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] is [From.GetFirstName]'s lover and the real father of the child!
translation: 那个我付钱雇佣去跟踪我的[GetFromRelation]的侍女证实了我的怀疑——[From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName]是[From.GetFirstName]的情人以及那个孩子真正的父亲！

original: The woman I hired to spy on my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has found out the shocking truth about her pregnancy. I was right, I am not the father... [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName] is, her own [GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]!
translation: 那个我付钱雇佣去跟踪我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]的女人发现了关于她的怀孕令人震惊的真相。我是对的，那个孩子的父亲并非是我……而是[From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName]，那可是她自己的[GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]啊！

original: By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I had better keep this quiet!

translation: 亵渎神灵！揭露这两个叛徒！
这虽然神圣……但依然是不忠的行径。揭露他们！
这是极其严重的叛国罪！

original: My [GetFromRelation] just stormed in, roaring and smashing chairs. He knows about my affair with [Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName]. He knows the child I carry is not his...
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]正怒不可遏、大吼大叫、还把椅子砸个稀巴烂。他知道了我和[Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName]之间的风流韵事，他知道我肚子里的那个孩子并非他亲生的……

original: [From.GetTitledName] knows about my affair with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. He knows the child she carries is actually mine...
translation: [From.GetTitledName]知道了我与[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]之间的风流韵事，他也知道了她肚子里的孩子实际上是我亲生的……
这可能意味着我的厄运将至！

original: The maid I hired to gain my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s confidence has not found anything at all suspicious about her pregnancy.
translation: 那个我付钱雇佣去获取[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]秘密的侍女并没有发现任何有关她的怀孕令人怀疑的地方。

original: I must KNOW. I will confront her directly!
translation: 我必须要知道！我要当面质问她！

original: The spies I hired at great expense to discover anything suspicious about my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] and her pregnancy have failed to turn up anything at all.
translation: 那些我花了大价钱雇佣的探子，他们试图寻找任何有关我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]和她怀孕的可疑之处，结果全都失败了，没有找到任何东西。

original: I guess the child must be mine then..?
translation: 然后，我猜那孩子的确是我的……？

original: My dear [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is suspicious of my pregnancy. He is here right now asking me if the child is really his!
translation: 我亲爱的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]对我的怀孕生了疑心。他正在质问我那个孩子是不是他亲生的！
泪眼汪汪地承认我和[Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName]之间的风流韵事

original: He's such a baby. Wrap him around my finger.
translation: 他幼稚得像个孩子。把他玩弄于鼓掌之间。

original: [From.GetFirstName] started crying when I asked her if she's being unfaithful. She profusely ensures me of her undying love, virtue and steadfastness...
translation: 当我质问[From.GetFirstName]是否不忠于我时，她开始哭泣。她一再地向我保证她忠贞的爱、为人妻的美德以及矢志不渝的坚定……

original: When asked outright, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] broke down and tearfully admitted to having an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName], blubbering about mercy and forgiveness!
translation: 在我彻底地质问下，我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]崩溃了，并含泪承认了她与[From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName]之间的风流韵事，哭求我的仁慈与宽恕！

original: When asked outright, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] broke down and tearfully admitted to having an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] - her own [GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]!
translation: 在我彻底地质问下，我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]崩溃了，并含泪承认了她与[From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName]之间的风流韵事——那可是她自己的[GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]！

original: [From.GetFirstName] got angry when I confronted her about the pregnancy, saying she lives in a prison and that I am denying her even the most basic freedoms...
translation: 当我质问[From.GetFirstName]的怀孕时，她变得愤怒，说她就像生活在监狱里并且我拒绝给她哪怕是最基本的自由……
好吧，现在我觉得惭愧了……

original: I found a note from my beloved [Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName] to meet him behind the smithy today, but it was my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] who waited for me there!
translation: 我发现了我亲爱的[Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName]给我的留言，他让我今天在铁匠铺后面与他碰面，但在那等着我的却是我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]！

original: I planted a note in my [GetFromRelation]'s bedroom, instructing her to meet her lover behind the smithy. I stood there waiting, hoping she wouldn't come... but she did. She confessed to an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName]!
translation: 我在我[GetFromRelation]的房间里放下了一份留言，指引她去铁匠铺后面与她的情人碰面。我在那等着，心里祈祷她不会前来……但她真的来了。她向我坦白，她与[From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName]有一段风流韵事！

original: I planted a note in my [GetFromRelation]'s bedroom, instructing her to meet her lover behind the smithy. She came alright, and brokenly confessed to an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] - her own [GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]!
translation: 我在我[GetFromRelation]的房间里放下了一份留言，指引她去铁匠铺后面与她的情人碰面。她来了，并且失控地向我坦白她与[From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName]之间的风流韵事——那可是她自己的[GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]！

original: [This.GetFirstName] and [Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] break off their love affair
You should pick a Focus for your character
translation: 你应当为你的角色挑选一个生活重心

original: This character is learning the arts of attraction and the thrill of the chase...
translation: 这个角色正在学习诱惑的艺术和勾引的兴奋……

original: This character is a well known seducer and heartbreaker.
translation: 这个角色以其作为一个勾引者和负心人而闻名。

original: This man is a notorious tail chaser who runs circles around jealous husbands and lovers.
translation: 这个男人是一个臭名昭著的尾随者，在嫉妒的丈夫们和情人们之间游刃有余。

original: This lady is a notorious minx who knows all about outmanoeuvring jealous wives and lovers.
translation: 这个女人是一个臭名昭著的狐狸精，懂得如何摆平那些嫉妒的妻子们和情人们。

original: Challenged to an honorably duel, this character cravenly refused.
translation: 被他人要求以一场荣誉的决斗作为挑战，但这个角色怯懦地拒绝了。

original: My current situation prevents me from focusing on $FOCUS$.
translation: 我现在的处境让我无法以$FOCUS$为生活重心。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] spends [This.GetPossPronoun] time and effort trying to govern well.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]花费[This.GetPossPronoun]时间和精力在统治上，以期治理好自己的领地。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] fraternizes with burghers and merchants, seeking to unravel the enigma of gold.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]与市民们和商人们亲近，试图找到生财之道。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] hones [This.GetPossPronoun] skills of attraction, for thrills and power. This Focus unlocks the §YSeduce§! option vs suitable targets.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]为了刺激和权力而磨练[This.GetPossPronoun]诱惑技巧。这个生活重心解锁§Y勾引§!这一互动选项，让你勾引合适的「猎物」。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] travels the realm making friends and killing off [This.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s creatures.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]游行全国，在旅途中结交好友与猎杀[This.Religion.GetHighGodName]的造物。这个生活重心会让你解锁狩猎这一活动选项。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] engages in all things martial, from melee training to reading the works of ancient generals. This Focus unlocks the §YDuel§! action vs rivals and foes.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]从事一切有关军事的事情，从近战训练到阅读古代名将的作品。这个生活重心解锁§Y决斗§!这一互动选项，让你与竞争对手或仇敌决斗。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] strives to become more popular and outgoing by hosting wild parties. This Focus unlocks the §YInvite to Carousing§! option vs suitable targets.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]努力通过举办狂野的派对使自己变得更加受欢迎和爱交际。这个生活重心解锁§Y邀请狂欢§!这一互动选项，让你邀请合适的对象参加派对。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] concentrates on family life, ensuring better relations between all family members.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]集中精力到家庭生活，确保自己所有家庭成员之间能够有更好的关系。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] buries [This.GetPossPronoun] nose in dusty old tomes, seeking knowledge and learning. Unlocks the §YBuild Observatory§! decision - the starting point for your studies.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]把[This.GetPossPronoun]身心投入到破旧的书卷里，追寻着知识和学问。解锁§Y建造天文台§!的决议——你的研究生涯的起点。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] leads a religious life of contemplation, prayer and meditation.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]过着充满沉思、祈祷和冥想的宗教生活。

original: Focus your seduction efforts on §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! in the hopes of gaining a new lover...
translation: 为了获得一个新的情人，把你的勾引工作聚焦到§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!身上……

original: This man is a notorious rake and debaucher who leaves a trail of broken hearts - and bastards - in his wake.
translation: 这个男人是个臭名昭著的放荡堕落者，当他醒来时，便留下一堆破碎的心——以及野种——扬长而去。

original: This woman is an infamous siren and temptress whose virtue is certainly in doubt...
translation: 这个女人是一个声名狼藉的女妖和荡妇，她的品德令人怀疑……

original: This character is a devoted administrator who loves order and efficiency above all things.
translation: 这个角色是一个热爱秩序和效率胜过其他任何东西的全心全意的管理者。

original: This character loves buildings, architecture and machinery, particularly anything related to siege warfare.
translation: 这个角色热爱建筑、建筑物以及大型机械，尤其是与围攻战有关的任何东西。

original: This character loves planning campaigns and analyzing the current state of affairs.
translation: 这个角色热爱策划战役和分析目前的形势。

original: This character is committed to being well liked, and spends most spare time in the company of others.
translation: 这个角色被认为受到大众的欢迎，并花费大部分闲暇时间在陪伴他人上。

original: This character leads a life of intrigue and manipulation.
translation: 这个角色过着充满密谋和操纵他人的生活。
任何人对你有「§Y$MOD$§!」这一好感修正

original: Does not have the '§Y$MOD$§!' Opinion of Anyone
translation: 没有人对你有「§Y$MOD$§!」这一好感修正

original: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! Lost in passion, they did not notice me, but I am still in shock!
translation: 就在前几天——我如常地潜伏了起来——我把[FromFrom.GetTitledName]和我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]抓个现行！由于沉浸在激情之中，他们并没有注意到我，但我依然感到非常震惊！

original: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! I can't believe it... [GetFromVsFromFromRelation] and [GetFromFromVsFromRelation]! They did not notice me, but I am still in shock!
translation: 就在前几天——我如常地潜伏了起来——我把[FromFrom.GetTitledName]和我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]抓个现行！我简直不敢相信……[GetFromVsFromFromRelation]和[GetFromFromVsFromRelation]！他们并没有注意到我，但我依然感到非常震惊！

original: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] doing what man should not do to man! They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock!
translation: 就在前几天——我如常地潜伏了起来——我发现[FromFrom.GetTitledName]和我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]正在做男人之间不应该做的事情！他们并没有注意到我，但我依然感到非常震惊！

original: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] performing a very strange and intimate exercise... naked. They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock!
translation: 就在前几天——我如常地潜伏了起来——我发现[FromFrom.GetTitledName]和我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]正在赤裸地做一个非常奇怪且亲昵的运动……全身赤裸。他们并没有注意到我，但我依然感到非常震惊！

original: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! A [From.GetManWoman] of God! They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock!
translation: 就在前几天——我如常地潜伏了起来——我把[FromFrom.GetTitledName]和我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]抓个现行！一名神的仆人！他们并没有注意到我，但我依然感到非常震惊！

original: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! For shame, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] could be [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] [From.GetSonDaughter]! They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock!
translation: 就在前几天——我如常地潜伏了起来——我把[FromFrom.GetTitledName]和我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]抓个现行！真不害臊，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]都能当[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun][From.GetSonDaughter]了！他们并没有注意到我，但我依然感到非常震惊！

original: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! For shame, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] could be [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] [From.GetFatherMother]! They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock!
translation: 就在前几天——我如常地潜伏了起来——我把[FromFrom.GetTitledName]和我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]抓个现行！真不害臊，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]都能当[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun][From.GetFatherMother]了！他们并没有注意到我，但我依然感到非常震惊！

original: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is a married [From.GetManWoman], by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
translation: 就在前几天，我像以往一样潜伏了起来。我将[FromFrom.GetTitledName]和我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]抓了个现行！他们并没有注意到我，但是我仍然感到非常震惊！[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]在上，[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]可是个已婚的[From.GetManWoman]！
真不要脸！他们必须被曝光！

original: Unholy sinners! They must be exposed!
translation: 邪恶的罪人！他们必须被曝光！

original: The flesh is weak. Forgive and forget.
translation: 血肉之躯是脆弱的。既往不咎。

original: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I know what you're doing with my [GetFromVsFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], you [GetFromRootInsult]. However, I understand the flesh is weak and would be willing to keep quiet about this affair for a small... donation.\n\n[From.GetBestName]
translation: 致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。我知道你在和我的[GetFromVsFromFromRelation][FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]干什么，你这个[GetFromRootInsult]！即便如此，我依然明白血肉之躯的脆弱，对这段风流韵事，我愿意闭上我的嘴巴，只要得到一点……捐款。\n\n[From.GetBestName]

original: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I know what you and your [GetFromFromRelation] are doing, you [GetFromRootInsult]. While you both sicken me, I am in dire need of funds and would be willing to forget in return for a small donation.\n\n[From.GetBestName]
translation: 致 [Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我知道你和你的[GetFromFromRelation]在干什么，你这[GetFromRootInsult]！虽然你们俩令我感到恶心，但是我正迫切地需要点资金。只要你肯出这笔小钱，我就会把这一切忘掉。\n\n[From.GetBestName]

original: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I've seen what you and my [GetFromVsFromFromRelation] are doing to each other, you [GetFromRootInsult]. Abomination! Yet, I am a kind [From.GetManWoman] and would be willing to forget in return for a small donation.\n\n[From.GetBestName]
translation: 致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。我看到了你和我的[GetFromVsFromFromRelation]互相在干什么，你这个[GetFromRootInsult]！真是令人厌恶！即便如此，你们应该庆幸我是一个宽容的[From.GetManWoman]，只要得到一笔小小的捐款，我愿意把这一切忘掉。\n\n[From.GetBestName]

original: To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetFirstName]. Here, take my money. If you do not keep quiet, I will do things to you that you cannot even begin to imagine!\n\n[From.GetFirstName]
translation: 致你这个[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetFirstName]！给你，拿着我的钱。如果你不学会闭上你的嘴，我将会对你做你想都不敢想的事情！\n\n[From.GetFirstName]
窥探别人也能获得如此奖励！

original: To the [GetFromFromRootInsult] [Root.GetFirstName]. Is this some kind of sick jest? [From.GetFirstName]'s virtue is immaculate! Do what you will, no one will believe your lies anyway.\n\n[FromFrom.GetFirstName]
